meaningMnemonic: A <radical>flood</radical> and a <radical>fire</radical>! At the same time? This is a <kanji>disaster</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>disaster</kanji> was caused by your <reading>cy</reading>borg (さい)! It's malfunctioning, running around leaking large amounts of water and breathing fire. I guess you didn't work out all the kinks before you let it roam wild.
